subject: Re: For Stefan and Dave
author: Stefan Bion
full_text:
Hi Ron,

> I read Stiffler's info on the http site listed below. Do you know what
> he is trying to accomplish with his Spatial Energy findings?

I haven't read his entire website, but I think what Stiffler is trying
to do is to invent a sort of electric perpetuum mobile.

> Also, any way for me to read what is contained in the ITC Bridge
> forum?

Of course, just surf to: http://www.itcbridge.com/

Stefan
